attributes.action: Make all Call of duty online games fair with no latency.
attributes.additional_details: The game becomes un-playable at certain hours of the day very noticeable when the USA players seem to flood the online gaming arena. There are plenty of examples of people complaining to the developers but they simply blame our connections and do nothing to make fair playing conditions.
attributes.background: Lots of players complain about gaming lag (latency) especially when in a gaming lobby with players from other countries. The developers should do more to balance the connections and make it fair.
